docs.lead_paragraph: Gulf Arab states are quietly applauding the arrival in the White House of a hawkish leader opposed to their adversary Iran, even if they suspect Donald Trump's short temper and abrasive Tweets may at times heighten tensions in the combustible Middle East.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Dec. 22 about President Barack Obama's foreign policy legacy, The Associated Press erroneously reported the title of Michael Mandelbaum at John Hopkins University, School of Advanced International Studies. He is professor emeritus, not foreign policy director.

docs.lead_paragraph: Governors and mayors say they are determined to continue with plans to address climate change, no matter what a Trump administration may do.
docs.abstract: Incoming Donald Trump administration appears set on reversing Pres Obama's progress on climate and environmental policies, but many mayors and governors say they will adhere to plans they have adopted under Obama administration regardless of directives from new White House.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama called for a smooth handover of control of the U.S. military to incoming commander in chief Donald Trump, as the outgoing president met Wednesday with military leaders for the last time.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump can do plenty on his own to unravel the Obama health care law, but some of those actions would create disruptions that undermine his administration's early promises. Other less sweeping steps could open the way for big changes, but might not get as much notice.

docs.lead_paragraph: The "Obama Girl" video -- that spicy homage to Illinois Senator and presidential candidate Barack Obama -- has been steaming up computer screens since its debut in June. The clip has racked up more than 3.1 million views on YouTube.
